animeDescription: Set in Hokkaido, Japan's outback, a young boy discovers a fawn whose mother has been hit by a car and attempts to raise it himself.  (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Oosumi Masaaki', ['Director']], ['Yamada Etsuji', ['Sound Director']], ['Takanashi Masaki', ['Theme Song Performance', 'Inserted Song Performance']], ['Sugiyama Koichi', ['Music']]]
